query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `employerMatchingPreferences` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `employerId` int NOT NULL,
  `technicalWeight` int DEFAULT 40 NOT NULL,
  `cultureWeight` int DEFAULT 30 NOT NULL,
  `wellbeingWeight` int DEFAULT 30 NOT NULL,
  `minOverallMatchScore` int DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  `minTechnicalScore` int DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  `minCultureScore` int DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  `minWellbeingScore` int DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  `enableAutoNotifications` boolean DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  `notificationFrequency` enum('immediate','daily_digest','weekly_digest') DEFAULT 'daily_digest' NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `employerMatchingPreferences_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `employerMatchingPreferences_employerId_unique` UNIQUE(`employerId`)
)

  `employerId` int NOT NULL,

  `enableAutoNotifications` boolean DEFAULT true NOT NULL,
  `notificationFrequency` enum('immediate','daily_digest','weekly_digest') DEFAULT 'daily_digest' NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `employerMatchingPreferences_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `employerMatchingPreferences_employerId_unique` UNIQUE(`employerId`)
)
